title: Mr Marsh comes to school
creator_credit: Basic Films, Central Office of Information, Leon Clore and John Krish
brief_description: A youth employment officer turns up suddenly at school to confront a number of children with the various problems they are likely to encounter as they embark on a career. Reconstructs some real and imaginary situations likely to help or hinder the school leaver at the vital time of transition from school to adult life.
